attributes.review: ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆 Shawty’s👩🏾like a melody🎵in my head 🧠that i can’t keep out❌got me singing like✍️nananana👄everyday😿like my iPod📱 stuck in replay🔄

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY DUMBFOUNDED
attributes.review: I wanted to see what I could do to support my non homophobic anti racism anti pedo anti Epstein island future 2020 candidate. But once I launched the app I was greeted with a message telling me to get off the app because I was a dirty Mexican

attributes.title: I’m so DONE
attributes.review: After I downloaded this app all the racist, misogynistic, homophobe men in my area started flocking at my house cuz they thought I WAS A TRUMP SUPPORTER. I do NOT want any man like that! So one star and I’m done with this app!😤😤😤🤢🤢🥱🥱🥱

attributes.title: TERRIBLE🤮🤮🤮
attributes.review: Worst app u have ever seen, it took so long was not programmed well and didn’t work AT ALL it’s obvious they didn’t spend their time with this horrendous app.

attributes.title: I’m furious 😡
attributes.review: Dumb app took all my information and wiped my phone. It took forever to get the data back. It’s completely rude.

attributes.title: worst app EVER!!
attributes.review: it kept glitching! and would even take me out of the app! was loading for EVERRRR! couldn't see any campaigns either. disgusting trump doesnt have my vote.

attributes.title: Very clunky app
attributes.review: It is really hard to use and I can’t get to my news in any fast way or easy way.

attributes.title: Worst Ever
attributes.review: Downloaded it and tried to open it but since it was online and I’m an international student, it told me that what I was doing was illegal. Worst Ever.

attributes.title: DO NOT GET IT
attributes.review: it took several hours to download then when it was done I opened the app and it deleted all my apps and contacts , DO NOT GET IT

attributes.title: I like it.... I don’t like it
attributes.review: I really wish we could reply to these comments. Sry trump but like I don’t like you. It’s my opinion... you have yours too :)
